name: WP Import Export Lite
author: VJInfotech

sections.description:
WordPress Import Export Plugin is an easy, quick and advanced Import & Export site data.

WordPress Import Export gives you ability to export you site data into Multiple file format and you can import those file in any of your site. All type of your Posts, Pages, Custom Post Types, Taxonomies, Comments and Users import/export in just one click. A great way to manage WordPress Site data between multiple sites.

WordPress Import Export Main Features

  • Pause, Resume & Stop process for import & export
  • Background import & export
  • Scheduled import & export ( Premium )
  • Powerful Filter available for import & export
  • Drag & Drop Field mapping
  • 19+ Freemium AddOns for multiple plugin support
  • Multiple File Format support for import export
  • Import process Log

Pause, Resume & Stop

  • import & export can be Pause, Resume & Stop.
  • plugin supports Pause and Resume with Background import & export
  • you can anytime stop any import & export processing

Background import & export

  • import & export processing in background.
  • Background import & export can be pause, resume and stop.
  • multiple import & export can be process same time.
  • simple import & export can be converted to Background import & export

Powerful Filters

  • you can filter any data when you export like post id is greater then 50.
  • for import, filter available for filtering your uploaded file data

Field Management

  • for export, you can rearrange and edit fields in just one click.
  • for import,drag and drop field mapping facility available.

Multiple File Format

  • multiple file format support for import and export both.
  • supports zip archives
  • supports format csv, xls, xlsx, json, txt, ods and xml

Schedule import & export ( Premium )

  • automatic schedule import export
  • schedule import export management
  • support with auto background import export

import Process Log

  • complete process log available
  • step by step import each record log available

19+ Freemium AddOns

  • Yoast SEO Import & Export
  • ACF, ACF Pro Import & Export
  • WPML Import & Export
  • Polylang Import & Export
  • WooCommerce import & export
  • Schedule import & export
  • Attribute import & export
  • Google Drive Import
  • Onedrive Import
  • DropBox Import
  • FTP/SFTP Import
  • Background Import Export
  • And much more

WP Import Export Professional Edition

Export Premium Addons

  • ACF / ACF Pro Export
  • Schedule Export
  • WooCommerce Export
  • WPML Export
  • Attribute export
  • Polylang Export

Import Premium Addons

  • ACF / ACF Pro Import
  • Dropbox File Import
  • Upload From FTP/SFTP
  • Google Drive File Import
  • Microsoft Onedrive Import
  • Schedule Import
  • WooCommerce Import
  • WPML Import
  • Attribute Import
  • Polylang Import

Upgrade to the Pro edition of WP Import Export

Live Demo

Try WP Import Export

sections.installation:
Automatic installation

Automatic installation is the easiest way to install WordPress Import Export plugin.

To do it, log in to your WordPress admin panel and go to : Plugin -> Add New and click on Upload Plugin.

Select the zip file and click on Install Now. After clicking that link, you will be asked if you are sure you want to install the plugin. Click yes and WordPress will automatically complete the installation process

Manual installation

The manual installation involves uploading all the files to your web server through a FTP software.

Unzip the archive, then upload the wp-import-export-lite folder to wp-content/plugins directory.

Finally activate the plugin through your WordPress admin.

sections.reviews:
Excellent for importing csv files

By chillmen on April 5, 2024

i've tested the plugin in Local installation wp 6.5, it's working great for importing csv files to a custom post type, it can also import featured images.
Excellent work, thank you for this plugin.

Not working for import

By Abhay (Abhay Raj) on March 29, 2024

Export everyhting but not working on import. bad plugin

Definitely the best, most flexible free import/export plugin

By ccrim on March 28, 2024

After looking into all the import/export plugin options I could find, this one stood out for being the most flexible and easy to work with. This was for a one time migration of an old database into WordPress and so I didn't really want to spend a lot for a one shot. That said, their Pro version is much more reasonably priced than the others.

This was the only available free plugin that supported importing all sorts of tables (I needed custom posts, users and comments), provided field mapping, supported custom fields and even let you save import and export settings. I had a little trouble with some missing error handling and one particular missing comment field but I was able to work around that and get my little project done fairly quickly.

Good stuff!

5 Stars! Not sure how anybody wouldn't like this plugin

By rynecallahan on March 19, 2024

This plugin makes my life so much easier all the time! Allows me to mass update content and add new content by the 100's. Excellent product, all for free!

Export anything, but import of most things is locked behind PRO.

By KingDingbat on March 7, 2024

Seems like a decent plugin, but it will make you waste time because you'll find that you cannot import your data unless you pay. There are only few types of Wordpress data (posts, pages, etc) that you can import, and you don't need this plugin to do that - Wordpress already allows you to import/export these without a plugin...
The description says
"Complete Import & Export solution for Posts, Pages, Custom Post, Users, Taxonomies, Comments, Products, Orders, Coupons, Customers."
but most of the options are locked behind paying for PRO version. I deleted the plugin after wasting time preparing to import coupons. This is not the correct way to inspire users to pay for your plugin.

Кастомные поля нужно вписывать самому

By (Monti213) on February 6, 2024

Гениально не подтягивать кастомные поля, а просить вписать самому название кастомного поля. Такое ощущение, что тот, кто делает плагин никогда его не использовал.

Worked perfectly for comments export and import

By MS416 on January 5, 2024

Thanks for the plugin. It worked perfectly for me. I migrated my site and rebuilt from scratch using WP tools and export to import posts, pages and other XML files. Comments was necessary to do separately and your plugin did the trick!

One other plugin wanted to charge money to import-export comments and another plugin failed - so yours was my last hope and it totally worked the way I expected. Cheers for the assistance!

Thanks again.

:)

By siergiejto (siergiejten) on June 30, 2023

Working really great with small imports.

But very slow with bigger xml files (over 5k records) ;/

This is the best and most convenient plugin!

By Oksana (qwerty100) on May 12, 2023

Due to the specifics of work, I often transfer content from other cms to Wordpress. This plugin is the most convenient to work with, and if you do not have something, try again and study the documentation. Thanks to the developers for their work and patience )

Works wonders - and pretty quick too!

By rickmaurinus on May 10, 2023

For my website with over 1000 pages, I needed a way to bulk update my posts. This plugin works wonders !
